<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/sites/file-types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all file type definitions configured for the site, which categorize uploaded attachments and documents throughout the system.

**Use Cases**
- Build file upload interfaces that enforce correct categorization
- Validate attachment types when creating tickets or assets programmatically
- Display appropriate file type options in custom forms or integrations

**Response Fields**
- `FileTypeId` - Numeric identifier used when uploading files
- `Name` - Display name (e.g., "Document", "Image", "PurchaseOrder")
- `Description` - Human-readable explanation of the file type's purpose
- `IsActive` - Whether this file type is currently available for use

**Common File Types**: Document (1), Image (2), PurchaseOrder (21), PurchaseOrderInvoice (22). Use [GET /api/v1.0/sites/my/settings](/docs/api/sites/get-my-site-settings) to see which file types are mapped in your site's configuration.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
